definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 公司在展覽會上展示了這種新模型的原型。

sentences.english: The exhibition of folk customs includes an attractive display of local foods.
sentences.chinese: 家鄉風味食品在這屆民俗民風展覽會上引衆人注目。

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 請問閣下是否有興趣優先登記以下展覽會？

sentences.english: A fun fair for O's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 一個給O慶祝生日的有趣展覽會啊。

sentences.english: We would like take the opportunity to thanks Y. B Wong Hong Wei for his presence to officially launched the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我們想借此機會感謝拿督王漢偉親臨及開幕此展覽會。

sentences.english: A continuous stream of visitors came to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 參觀展覽會的人絡繹不絕。

sentences.english: "Picture At An Exhibition" is one of the famous piano suite.
sentences.chinese: 《圖畫展覽會》是鋼琴作品中著名的組曲之一。

sentences.english: Admission to the exhibition will be by invitation only.
sentences.chinese: 只有持邀請函者纔可進入展覽會。

sentences.english: Various kinds of sculptured handicrafts will be shown at this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 展覽會將展出各式各樣的圓雕工藝品。

sentences.english: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我國將和另外一個國家聯合主辦這次展覽會。

sentences.english: PINZHI attends the furniture fair in Longjiang with its "RUBY M" and "NORSON FAMILY" brand every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年龍江傢俱展覽會“品至”都組織旗下品牌參展。

sentences.english: Representing the company at trade fairs and exhibitions .
sentences.chinese: 代表公司參加貿易展銷會和展覽會。

sentences.english: The exhibition presented a picture of general prosperity in China's economy.
sentences.chinese: 展覽會展示了中國經濟一片欣欣向榮的景象。

sentences.english: There were lots of amusements at the fair.
sentences.chinese: 展覽會場有很多有趣的東西。

sentences.english: African Commodities Exhibitions shall be organized well to enlarge the two-way flow of goods.
sentences.chinese: 辦好非洲商品展覽會，擴大雙向貨物貿易。

sentences.english: This ticket will admit two to the opening ceremony of the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 這張展覽會開幕式的入場券可以允許兩人入場。

definition: the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
